import React from 'react'; import { Link, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Publish } from '@material-ui/icons'; import './product.scss'; export default function Product() { const location = useLocation(); const movie = location.movie; return (

Movie

id: 123
sales: 5923
active: yes
in stock: no
); }
